dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HRES 24 IH: Expunging the December 18, 2019, impeachment of President Donald John Trump.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Greene of Georgia (for herself, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mr. Collins, Mr. Crane, Ms. Malliotakis, Mr. Moylan, Mr. Nehls, Mrs. Luna, and Mr. Van Drew) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: Expunging the December 18, 2019, impeachment of President Donald John Trump.

whereas.text: Whereas President Trump was wrongfully accused of misconduct in House Resolution 755, Impeaching Donald John Trump, President of the United States, for high crimes and misdemeanors, as demonstrated by the information revealed in an unclassified FDâ€“1023 FBI document: Now, therefore, be it

section.text: That the December 18, 2019, impeachment of President Donald John Trump is expunged, as if such Articles had never passed the full House of Representatives, as the facts and circumstances upon which such Articles were based did not meet the burden of proving the commission of high Crimes and Misdemeanors, as set forth in section 4 of article II of the Constitution.
